article: hamid karzai 's closest rival in afghanistan 's landmark election refused to concede defeat sunday , saying a reversal of early results and an investigation of fraud allegations could yet make him the country 's first popularly elected president .
abstract: karzai 's rival for presidency calls foul over landmark election prepares for opposition
